entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind light except north 30 km/h near Bowen Island overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
